div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 579 Zaklopaca, near Belgrade, Yugoslavia, (1181) 1928 Burial: 2nd-1st cent. B.C. (T) Contents: 1570 AR Apollonia, Illyria 450 dr. Dyrrhachium: 1120 dr. Disposition: Belgrade Petroviƒç, Starinar 7 (1932), pp. 40-65, some illus. RassNum. 1933, p. 25 (review of above)
